item.title: Sone14-look at the other one new problem :S
item.dc:creator: @sone14 sone14
item.description:
@sone14 wrote:

[quote=“splinter-x, post:2, topic:352748”]Lol, what source are you using and is that your server ip? Try this:

Change

"pkplanetjto.no-ip.org"

To

"127.0.0.1"

That’s for your to connect but for your players to connect with the client they will have to use your server ip so before you upload your client for people to download and play… Change 127.0.0.1 back to whatever your server ip is and compile it;)
I appreciate rep if this helped:D[/quote]

new gui

}

private Gui(String args[]) 
{
	super();
	try 
	{

System.out.println(“Connecting”);
//launchURL(“PKPlanet”);
Serverip = “127.0.0.1”;
sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));

		initUI();

now i keep getting “error connecting to server please relaod client and try again”

shit i deleted the “)” next to the serverip = “127.0.10.1”); and compiled and got an error

uploading pic

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

ok tryed fixing it and now

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

item.source: Sone14-look at the other one new problem :S

item.title: Sone14-look at the other one new problem :S
item.dc:creator: @splinter-x splinter-x
item.description:
@splinter-x wrote:

Lol, what source are you using and is that your server ip? Try this:

Change

"pkplanetjto.no-ip.org"

To

"127.0.0.1"

That’s for your to connect but for your players to connect with the client they will have to use your server ip so before you upload your client for people to download and play… Change 127.0.0.1 back to whatever your server ip is and compile it;)
I appreciate rep if this helped:D

Read full topic
